address: 5008 Buford Hwy Ste C, Atlanta, GA 30341
subHeading: Elite legal representation and extensive experience ensuring the best settlement for your case.
valueProp: Contact Jimmy Hwang, LLC to schedule an appointment with your injury attorney in Atlanta, GA. Jimmy Hwang, LLC is an injury attorney law firm in personal injuries and work injuries.

testimonalData.text: We wanted to thank you for all the help you provided us. It was our first time going through this kind of situation. You were very informative and more than anything, very nice and willing to help. We will never forget your thoughtfulness.
testimonalData.author: M.P. and A.M.

testimonalData.text: Thanks big time! You’re the best! Thank you!
testimonalData.author: L.O.

testimonalData.text: I had a great experience with the firm. I’ve actually called them on two different occasions and both cases had great outcomes. They are very kind, caring and I can tell they genuinely care for their clients. I would absolutely recommend them! Thanks for everything!
testimonalData.author: J.C.
